p: We used the ORYZA2000v2n14s1 model to identify the main causes of future yield changes under climate change. In the model an elevated CO 2 concentration has an exclusively positive effect on rice productivity. In the model air temperature affects rice growth and productivity in various ways (see Table 2 for an overview). From our simulation results two hypotheses emerged on which of the processes listed in Table 2 were the main causes of simulated yield decline. The following two sections describe how we tested these hypotheses.
